title: Rockets in Retrograde: Lakers Punish Houston in Game 4 | The Mismatch
description:
Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor discuss the Rockets’ abysmal showing against the Lakers in Game 4 and what potential moves the team might make in the likely event they lose the series (1:53). They then discuss the down-to-the-wire Game 6 between the Celtics and Raptors (26:31), Kawhi’s dominance in the playoffs versus the regular season (41:59), and the age-old question of whether Giannis will stay or go (58:07).

Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O'Connor
